name: Charter Flight Group
tag_list: charter-private-jet, charter-flights, private-jet-charters, air-charter-service, business-jets, jet-charter-broker, air-charter-company, cargo-air-charter
overview:
Charter Flight Group (CFG) is a private jet charter broker and aircraft management company based at McClellan-Palomar Airport in Carlsbad, California.

CFG serves private luxury travelers and executives with worldwide private and executive jet charters, featuring a network of 5,700 private jets based throughout the United States, Europe, the Caribbean, Central and South America, Asia and Pacific Islands. Prestigious executive jet concierge service available 24/7/365. Company provides the most competitive pricing in the industry for empty legs and one-ways on every type of aircraft.

All flights are compliant with Part 135 of Title 14 of the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) regulations (or the EU OPS and EASA equivalents in Europe). All aircraft are ARG/US Platinum, IS-BAO aircraft and WYVERN Recommended aircraft backed by Charter Vault Escrow.

The Company provides worldwide cargo aircraft charter services for transportation of time-critical freight or outsize equipment, including delivery to hard-to-reach, remote locations.

Charter Flight Group provides customized aircraft management services for private and corporate aircraft owners with flight administration services, hangar services, maintenance tracking, crew management and full financial reporting.
